scripts.lint: if pnpm exec eslint --version >/dev/null 2>&1; then if [ -f eslint.config.js ] || [ -f eslint.config.cjs ] || [ -f eslint.config.mjs ] || [ -f .eslintrc ] || [ -f .eslintrc.js ] || [ -f .eslintrc.cjs ] || [ -f .eslintrc.json ] || [ -f .eslintrc.yml ] || [ -f .eslintrc.yaml ]; then pnpm exec eslint . --ext .ts; else echo 'Skipping lint (eslint not configured)'; fi; else echo 'Skipping lint (eslint not installed)'; fi
